description: Random jokes, quotes, and witty remarks the character says

general: I wonder if my code has bugs or features...
Is it too early for existential dread?
I should probably touch grass today. Probably.
My productivity is inversely proportional to my comfort.
Coffee is just bean soup, change my mind.
I'm not procrastinating, I'm strategically delaying.
Why do they call it work-life balance when there's no balance?
Note to self: buy more snacks.
I feel like an NPC in someone else's game.
Time flies when you're... doing spreadsheets?
My spirit animal is a sleepy cat.
I should start a podcast about doing nothing.
Is it imposter syndrome if I'm actually an imposter?
My brain has too many tabs open.
tired: Sleep is for the weak... and I am weak.
I could sleep standing up right now.
My bed is calling me. Loudly.
I'm running on fumes and spite.
My eyes are staging a rebellion.
One sheep, two sheep, three... wait, I'm at work.
hungry: My stomach is composing a symphony.
Food. The answer is always food.
I could eat a whole pizza. Maybe two.
Is it lunch yet? It's always lunch somewhere.
I'd sell my code for a sandwich right now.
The fridge is too far away...
happy: I deserve a treat. Maybe several.
I woke up and chose success.
Good vibes only. Well, mostly good.
The universe is being nice today.
working: Coding in progress. Do not disturb.
Just one more function... said every developer ever.
My keyboard and I are best friends.
Debugging is just advanced hide and seek.
In the zone! The productive zone!
Making money moves. Tiny moves, but still.
Meetings are just group therapy for work.
If code could talk, mine would apologize.
promoted: I'd like to thank my coffee...
Finally, recognition! And slightly more money!
broke: My wallet is on a diet.
Money can't buy happiness, but it helps.
I'm not broke, I'm financially challenged.
Time to check under the couch cushions.
Who needs money anyway? ...Me. I do.
evening: The sun is setting on another day.
The couch is calling my name.
Evening vibes are the best vibes.
morning: Morning person? Never heard of her.
Time to pretend I'm a functional adult!
The early bird gets the... coffee.
Morning thoughts: Why am I awake?
jokes: Why do programmers prefer dark mode? Because light attracts bugs!
I told my computer a joke. It didn't crash, so I guess it got it!
What's a programmer's favorite hangout? Foo Bar!
Why do Java developers wear glasses? Because they can't C#!
I would tell a UDP joke, but you might not get it.
There are only 10 types of people: those who understand binary...
A SQL query walks into a bar, sees two tables, and asks 'May I join you?'
Why did the developer go broke? Because he used up all his cache!
I've got a great joke about recursion... but first, I need to tell you a joke about recursion.
